titleStmt.title: Miscellanea spiritualia: or, Devout essayes: the second part, composed by the honorable Walter Montagu Esq; Abbot of Nanteul, &c.
Miscellanea spiritualia. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Montagu, Walter, 1603?-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Crook, Gabriel Bedell, and partners; and are to be sold at the Ship in S. Pauls Church-yard, and at the Middle Temple-gate in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Octob. 31. 1653"; the 4 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
